text: The Minister for Public Utilities () was originally a short lived, independent ministerial title, following a split from the Minister for Commerce, Industry, and Seafaring. It has since been revived by the Second Lars Løkke Rasmussen Cabinet. ==List of ministers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan=2| ! rowspan=2| Portrait ! rowspan=2| Name (Born-Died) ! colspan=3| Term ! rowspan=2| Political Party ! rowspan=2| Government ! rowspan=2| Ref. |- ! Took office ! Left office ! title: Minister for Public Utilities (Denmark)
